ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Fighting on after linkdeath
ygData.msgSnippet: If a beneficial spell is in slot 1 chances are that the LD person will buff himself (or maybe group spells too) I was in lower guk and my druid friend sow ed
ygData.messageBody:
If a beneficial spell is in slot 1 chances are that the LD person will buff
himself (or maybe group spells too)

I was in lower guk and my druid friend sow'ed himself and left us in the
dust (damn him!)

Minkin/Rakka
Somewhat Retired from sol ro
